title: Prohibited acts
context: [ยง453D-5] Prohibited acts. Except as specifically provided in this chapter, no person shall engage in the practice of mental health counseling or use the title of &ldquo;licensed mental health counselor&rdquo; or &ldquo;mental health counselor&rdquo; without a valid license issued under this chapter. Any person who violates this section shall be subject to a fine of not more than $1,000 for each separate offense. Each day of each violation shall constitute a separate offense. Any action taken to impose or collect the fine imposed under this section shall be a civil action. [L 2004, c 209, pt of ยง2; am L 2008, c 206, ยง1]
